name: Snowman Rave
description:
This game was made for the 2D Shooter Jam #1 - Theme: Christmas.

The game takes place in a desert Iceland where some snowman folks got mad because of the Climate Change.  By the way,  Climate Change is the name of the buddy you take control. The reason he has that black skin color is that he came to bring the pollution to Iceland.

You, as a representation of the Climate Change, should get rid of those who are trying to defeat you in your journey. Good Luck!

 - Some sttufs you'll find -

• 2 Type of enemies (Spoiler: there are 3)

• 2 Type of weapons

• A strange and bugged tree. ( Be kind with her )

• BLOOD. SO. MUCH. BLOOD. 

• The coolest death screen image ever. ( You can use it as a background if you want to)

• Bad sound effects ( well... we tried our best )

• A Beautiful menu screen ( That blue thing in the sky was supposed to be a cloud )

CONTROLS

W, A, S, D → MOVEMENT

MOUSE LEFT BUTTON → FIRE

Number 1, Number 2 →  SWITCH WEAPONS. ( YOU CAN'T RELOAD )

That is it. Survive as much as you can. 

DONT GIVE UP. THAT WILL BE WORTH IT.
